actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require the preparation of community economic adjustments plans before the closure or realignment of military installations under base closure laws.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Defense from closing or realigning a military installation under a base closure law until a community economic adjustment plan is prepared. Outlines provisions concerning plan preparation and requirements. Authorizes the Secretary to provide assistance to a State or local government or organization for preparation of such plan through grants or cooperative arrangements. Requires each plan to include: (1) a proposal for utilizing a portion of such installation for non-defense purposes, if economically feasible; or (2) a detailed explanation if no portion is determined appropriate for non-defense purposes.

titles.title: A bill to require the preparation of community economic adjustments plans before the closure or realignment of military installations under base closure laws.
